predicate.note: Frames file for 'underscore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with 'emphasize'.

roleset.name: emphasize

example.name: active
example.text: The results underscore Sears's difficulties in implementing the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business.
example.arg: Sears's difficulties in implementing the ``everyday low pricing'' strategy that it adopted in March as part of a broad attempt to revive its retailing business

example.name: passive
example.text: Saab's problems were underscored *trace* Friday when the company announced that its car division had a 1.2 billion kronor ($186.1 million) loss during the first eight months of this year, slightly worse than Saab-Scania had forecast in its first-half report last month.
example.arg: when the company announced that its car division had a 1.2 billion kronor ($186.1 million) loss during the first eight months of this year, slightly worse than Saab-Scania had forecast in its first-half report last month

example.name: with hearer
example.text: Mary underscored to John that he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.
example.arg: he must never ever call her 'Snoogie-wookums' in public.
